name: Keep It Safe!
description:
Keep it safe! is a simple tower-defense game.  It's main purpose is to defend the base from enemies.  For this you have at your disposal a multitude of weapons and defense towers, each with a different use, but also a price. At the beginning of each match you receive a certain number of energy points, which can still be generated by defeating enemies. These towers can be upgraded, and then later sold.

CONTROLS MOVE AROUND THE MAPW, A, S, D SELECT WEAPONCLICKDEPLOY WEAPONCLICK ON GRIDZOOMSCROLLPAUSE/ OPTIONS CLICK PAUSE BUTTON (top right)START WAVECLICK START WAVE BUTTON (top right)VOLUMEMAIN MENU>OPTIONS TOWERS
  • EMP GENERATOR: Slows down enemies
  • PLASMA LANCE: Has a slow shooting rate, but high big range (air+ground)
  • MACHINE GUN: High fire rate, low damage (air+ground)
  • ROCKET LAUNCHER: High damage, only ground
  • MISSILE ARRAY: Self destructs after firing a missile barrage
  • ENERGY PYLON: Generates energy
